description:
Berke is back and he's hotter than ever! He's let his body hair grow out a little more (but not too much — wouldn't want to upset the girlfriend).
Man, Berke was a tough nut to crack. I've been asking him for months now to come back and indulge in the "other side." First he said yes, then no, then yes, then... well, you get the idea.
Finally he said yes. I don't know if he needed the money, but that was probably it. He does mention in the video that his girlfriend had been out of town for nearly two weeks, but then they all use that as the "reason" for needing to get off.
At any rate, Ronnie was really excited about getting to blow Berke. As we learned previously, he likes who are "older" and that hairy is a big plus.
How did it go? Well, that 10-days-in-the-making load of Berke's ended up all over Ronnie's face, neck, and in his mouth!
title: Blowing Berke
